display_long_description:
Express your ideas with realistic brushes and drawing tools; enliven your art by mixing colors and paints to suit your style!  Be the artist you've dreamed of being and enjoy the wonders of Drawing Desk VR!

1. Invite friends to your drawing session or VR Gallery and have fun!
2. Interactive brush holder with several key drawing tools - Pencil, Paint Brush, Line Brush, Palette Knife, Sponge, Smudge Cloth and Eraser.
3. Pre-made color palette with accompanying paint tubes for mixing colors realistically.
4. In built Web browser to search and inspire your creative process.
5. Stencils to speed up your creative process.
6. Line drawing tool with Angle is added for you to quickly and accurately sketch an artwork.
7. Sync your Drawing Desk account and create your own VR Art Gallery. Then invite your friends into it for fun hangout!

Designed for all artists, Drawing Desk VR brings you a fun way for you to create and showcase your work!
